children.description: Content rendered inside the list item (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the list item

isHoverable.description: Modifies the list item to include hover styles on :hover

isRead.description: Adds styling to the list item to indicate it has been read

onClick.description: Callback for when a list item is clicked (Function: (event: any) => void)

readStateScreenReaderText.description: Visually hidden text that conveys the current read state of the notification list item

tabIndex.description: Tab index for the list item
